msContents.summary: This is a transcription of the Khaḍgaśataka manuscript in the Asiatic Society of Bengal, Kolkata. It contains just the verses and is complete.

lg.l:
|| kalpāṃtikrūrakālabhrukuṭikuṭilatākalpakalpāgramuṣṭiḥ
krudhyatkālī
kaṭākṣāṅkita iva kalayan kāṃtim ekāṃtakālīṃ ||

krīḍety asyākrameṇa krakacakṛtikṛtī kruṃbhikuṃbhāgra
kruṭakroḍe pūtkṛttakaṃṭhotthitarudhirakaṇākīrṇakoṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 1 ||

khaṃ prekhadbhiḥ kharāṃśoḥ prakha
rakeraśikhāḥ khaṃḍayan svair mayūkhaiḥ
khelāsaṃkhyeṣu khaṃjīkṛttaraṇarasikaḥ saṃmukhānāṃ khanitraṃ ||

khyātta
'saukhyasya khāniḥ khalu kamitṛjuṣāṃ khecarīṇām akharvaḥ
khelaty uśvātakhaḍgaḥ pratiyuvasu khanatkā
ravān asya khaḍgaḥ || 2 ||

gāḍhaṃ gātrasya guptigrahaṇam eva gaṇayyāgrataḥ svargamārgaṃ
grasyatrasyagrahāgresa
rakaraguṇitodagrajāgradgabhastiḥ ||

gardhogragraṃthigotragrahilaripugaṇagrāsabhaṃgīgṛhīto
garja
ty agresarāgrāgrahagilanaguruḥ saṃgare maṃḍalāgraḥ || 3 ||

ghrāṇaṃ saṃgrāmalakṣmyā ghranasṛtiyaśasām aṃghriru
jgho mahārghasyopaghnaḥ sāhasasyālaghuhṛdayalaghur bhītyaghaughasya vighnaḥ |

ghoṭaḥ kīrtter ghanābhāpaghana
gajaghaṭādyājanaiḥr ghṛṇyanighno
ghūrṇaty ujgharmaghṛṣṭiprakharaghṛṇisamāghnātighoro sya khaḍgaḥ | 4 |

caṃḍaś caṃḍīśacakṣuś cirabhṛtaciṣamārccidhvajārc cānubhāle
caṃḍyāś cāmīkarābhe ṃjanacayakhacitaṃ
citrakaṃ kauryacaṃcuḥ ||

citraṃ svācāṃtavīrāsur adhiracirucā cuṃcitaś cākacakyāc
cakṣuṣkarmāṇi cūṣa
ty aviraruciracavaṃcako syāsir uccaiḥ | 5 |

chāyāvāṃchānurūpochasinaripuśucau chādanaṃ kṛchavṛṣṭau
chāyāvāhāśanes tachalasamitilasachauryakālālipuchaṃ ||

chātachatripravīraḥ chiduragaṇacaṇaḥ
chekahṛchokakārī
chāyākāṃtachavīvyatikaravaśaṃto mūrchatīddho sya khaḍgāḥ || 6 ||

jaṃghālo jai
trajaṃnyājirabhuvi janayajaṃtujāte svarārtti
jīvātur vāhujasya trijagati jayino dorbhujaṃgasya si
hvā ||

jyājānir vyāgrajāgradgajaradanaśilābhaṃjanājasayogyo
jātajvālo jaṭāvān iha jayati
jagajjitvaro muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 7 ||

jhautkārīnjaitrajanye jhajigi janayato janmikarṇajvarārtti
jhaṃjhā
vātānukārān_jhaṇajhāṇitijhaṇātkāriṇaḥ projjihānaḥ ||

jhāṣāṃkīṃ tām avasthāṃ jhaṭiti
ripujanaṃ grāhayan dhūrjaṭīṣṭāṃ
bhūranbhamprāhiteṣūjhitaraṇarabhasaprojjihīte tya khaḍgaḥ || 8 ||

ṭaṃkā
rat_ghaṭṭitā yā jhaṭiti vighaṭayan_ koṭiśaś cāpayaṣṭīṣ ṭaṃko vidvadgirīṇā karaṭikaṭakaṭāhā
tikuṭṭāgrakoṭiḥ ||

duḥkūṭair yaṣṭikūṭaiḥ kuṭakuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ koṭisaṃkhyaiḥ
kheṭair durghāṭavāṭān_
pratibhaṭasubhaṭāṃṣ ṭīkate muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 9 ||

ṭhātkārī kaṃṭhasīmanyatikaṭhinatare skaṃdhapīṭhe kaṭhaurai
pṛ
ṣṭhāṣṭhīlānukāre śaṭhakamachapateḥ kuṃbhapṛṣṭhe pi caibhe ||

drāk_drāghiṣṭhaḥ kaṭhorachavijaṭharataradyotasaṃghaṭṭamū
rchatkoṣṭhāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ prakurvan_ripuśirasi luṭhaty etadīyaḥ kuṭhāraḥ || 10 ||

ḍiṃbho daṃḍāyudhasya pradhanadha
nanaḍiccaṃḍadoḥ kuṃḍalīṃdrakṣveḍaḥ prodaṃḍadarpādviradananigaḍo ḍiṃḍimaḥ śauryabharttuḥ ||

asya prācaṃḍyabhāṃḍyaṃḍaṃ dhṛ
tamadhupagaladgaṃḍavenaṃḍaśuṃḍākāṃḍaṃ khaṃ pitanvan_ yudhi dhutaṃjaḍimā hiṃḍate maṃḍalāgraḥ || 11 ||

ḍhakkāsvārū
ḍhakīrttiprasṛtisuvijayaśrīvivoḍhā nirūḍho
bāḍhaṃ soḍhātigāḍhapraharaṇasamitau līḍhakoṣṇā
strasīṃdhuḥ ||

rīḍhā gūḍhapraharttur dṛḍhimakulagṛhaṃ nyastaśastreṣu ṣaṇḍho
nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayudhapratihatiṣu dṛḍhaṃ
ḍhauṃkate mukhya khaḍgaḥ || 12 ||

prāṇā darpasya pāṇī raṇaśamanaśiśoḥ kārmaṇa dveṣaṇānāṃ
tūrṇaṃ sadvā
rabāṇavraṇakaraṇakṛtī kīrṇadurmarṣaṇārciḥ ||

kauṣṇadviṭ_śoṇitāktaḥ || kharakiraṇaghṛṇiśreṇi
śāṇo ruṇaśrīr
udgūrṇo vāraṇānāṃ gaṇam asṛṇi śṛṇāty asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 13 ||

tṛpyaddaṃti¦
kṣitīṃdraṃ taralatarataratpattibhaṃgaṃ vighūrṇattuṃgāśvāvarttagartta niśitatamamilatkuṃttasaṃtānanakram ||

tvaṃ
gatīkṣṇāsitūrvattimiham anatidalachaktimuktiṃ raṇādhviṃ
tāras tīrṇaṃ titīrṣus tṛṇalavavad arīn asya kha
ḍgaḥs tṛṇoti || 14 ||

sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ śvasadbhir grathitapṛthupṛṣadvīkṣaṇais tīrthamātraṃ
samanvānair apārthaṃ śi
thilaraṇakathair vepathuvyarthaśastraiḥ ||

saṃprāptaiḥ sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ prathitapathacarais trastanetrātithitvaṃ
nī
taḥ pratyarthisārthair vyathayati savidhasthān apīddho sya khaḍga || 15 ||

dṛpyaddoḥkālakūṭadrumataruṇadalaṃ | da¦
rpadaṃttāvaleṃdradrāghīyoddānalekhā daradūlitadaleṃdīvaradroṇidehaḥ ||

dīvyannaidāghamadhyaṃdinadivasama¦
ṇidyotadutprekṣyadīptir
dauḥsthityaṃ dīrghadīrghaṃ dadad arisudṛsāṃ dīpyate mukhya khaḍgaḥ || 15 ||

dhairyasyādhāraya
ṣṭir dhṛtavirudhavadhūsādhvaso dhāma dhāmnāṃ
dhūmaḥ krodhānalasya pradhanarathaddharasyoddhuro dhūrdharo yaṃ |

dhī
rodāttor dhvavāhā dharaṇidharadhṛtas tīkṣṇadhārādharo ‘ddhā
dhīrānauddhatyabhājo raṇadharaṇicarānasya
dhūnoti khaḍgaḥ || 17 ||
